title: REQUEST_TASK_MOVE_NETWORK_STATE_TRANSITION
content:
0xD01015C7316AE1760x885724DE// RequestTaskMoveNetworkStateTransition
BOOL REQUEST_TASK_MOVE_NETWORK_STATE_TRANSITION(Ped ped, char* name);Parameters:ped: A ped handle.name: The name of the target request state in the move network file.Returns: Technically a void. Scripts treat this as a boolean, but the game never sets the result, so it will return the ped handle instead.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for REQUEST_TASK_MOVE_NETWORK_STATE_TRANSITION
RequestTaskMoveNetworkStateTransition(ped, '')
